information: PRIVATE MARKET is a French company. We are a recognised leader and wholesaler specialised in the de-stocking of renowned brands in the universe of Sport, Surfing, Lifestyle and the Outdoors. We only work directly with our partner brands and sell stock whatever its origin: traditional end-of-series, returned goods and representing samples. Plus, our experience in textiles has enabled us to win over the large and small electrical appliance, and hygiene sector. This helps us provide our clients with a larger offer at competitive prices. With over 250 clients throughout Europe, we are recognised as one of the French leaders in de-stocking. We would be delighted to start a commercial relationship with you. Do not hesitate to contact us and let us know your needs. We will send you our offers. Don't hesitate to contact us for more details or our product catalogue by email.
